findings.name: CAA Record
findings.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

findings.name: Prometheus Monitoring System - Unauthenticated
findings.description: Detects unauthenticated access to Prometheus Time Series Collection and Processing Server by checking for specific elements in the response from the `/graph` endpoint.

findings.name: Prometheus flags API endpoint
findings.description: The flags endpoint provides a full path to the configuration file. If the file is stored in the home directory, it may leak a username.
